It seems straightforward for a full-state miner to generate the witness. I'm just wondering how would it look like for a transaction sender to attach the witness? What does the state trie look like on the transaction sender side and on the miner side? Thanks. ðŸ™‚

author: .vbuterin
content: I think in the first versions of any of these proposals, it would be the miner that adds the witness

author: .vbuterin
content: In order for the tx sender to be able to generate a witness, the tx sender would need to know ahead of time what accounts the transaction can access
